name: Tell Me
description:
Point-and-click social change game developed for a class. Geared toward children between the ages of 6–9; aims to teach social interaction and kindness to kids who may or may not be socially impaired.

Team

Art by Briea Dowse and Amila Nuhodzic
Designed by Jacob Olson
Produced by Alex Dalton
Programmed by yours truly
